Enhance Your Data Security with Vallum:

Protect your enterprise data and ensure compliance with Vallum, a cutting-edge DLP tool designed specifically for generative AI environments. Our extension provides robust data loss prevention capabilities, helping you safeguard sensitive information and while enabling access to generative AI tools.

Why Vallum?

üîí ENHANCED SECURITY:

Protect your enterprise data with advanced encryption and real-time monitoring using artificial intelligence. The Vallum extension ensures that your sensitive information remains secure across all generative AI interactions. We use sophisticated semantic-based algorithms and predictive AI models to identify and block potential data breaches in real-time.

üöÄ SEAMLESS INTEGRATION:

Easily deploy our extension within your existing AI infrastructure. Designed for compatibility with major AI platforms and workflows, the Vallum extension integrates effortlessly to provide comprehensive protection.

üìà COMPLIANCE AND GOVERNANCE:

Tailor your data protection strategies with flexible policy settings using your custom Vallum Dashboard. Define specific rules and guidelines that match your organization‚Äôs security requirements, ensuring that all data interactions align with your compliance standards.

üïµÔ∏è COMPREHENSIVE CONTENT INSPECTION:

Automatically analyze and categorize data sent to AI models. Our DLP tool ensures that sensitive information, including personally identifiable information (PII) and confidential business data, is protected from unintended exposure.

üîç ACTIONABLE INSIGHTS:

Gain valuable insights into data usage and potential vulnerabilities. Our extension‚Äôs detailed analytics and reporting features provide you with the information needed to strengthen your data protection strategies.

**What‚Äôs New:**

- **New AI Model Support:** Expanded compatibility with the latest generative AI models, ensuring that all new technologies are covered under your data protection policies.
- **Enhanced Policy Customization:** Improved interface for creating and managing data protection rules, offering greater flexibility and control.

**Get Started with Vallum Today!**

Click 'Add to Chrome' to integrate Vallum into your enterprise environment and start protecting your data from unauthorized exposure. Join leading organizations that trust Vallum to safeguard their digital assets.

**Support**

At Vallum, we are committed to advancing data security and compliance solutions for modern enterprises. For support and inquiries, visit vallum.ai, or contact support@vallum.ai.
